param.name: autoParagraph
param.label: Auto Paragrah
param.description: Determines whether automatically create wrapping blocks around inline contents inside document body, this helps to ensure the integrality of the block enter mode. Note: Changing the default value might introduce unpredictable usability issues.

param.name: startupMode
param.label: StartUp Mode
param.description: The mode to load at the editor startup. It depends on the plugins loaded. By default, the 'wysiwyg' and 'source' modes are available.

param.name: useComputedState
param.label: Use Computed State
